overview:
Mark Francischiello is Axentraâ€™s Vice President of North American Business Development and Sales, developing HipServâ€™s strategic relationships that will contribute to accelerated revenue growth. Mark has more than fifteen years of diversified sales and sales management experience in the software industry, with a successful track record of rapid, profitable revenue growth in startup based companies.

Prior to joining Axentra, Mark was Director of Sales at GraphOn Corporation, a technology leader in server-based computing software, where he contributed to a successful IPO and was responsible for North America sales and business development activities to increase corporate, channel and OEM sales. Prior to GraphOn, Mark served as Director of Channel Sales at Dr. Solomonâ€™s Software, acquired by Network Associate, where he helped the organization achieve consecutive quarterly revenue growth. Markâ€™s experience also includes several years at Logicraft Information Systems, acquired by Microtest/HIS, a manufacturer of the first multimedia network storage solution for enterprise networks. Mark holds a dual bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science and Mathematics from Keene State College in New Hampshire.
